text: Default save path for Python idle?
Does anyone know where or how to set the default path/directory on saving python scripts prior to running?
On a Mac it wants to save them in the top level ~/Documents directory..  Yuck!
I would like to specify a real location.
Alternatively I'd be cool with just not saving the file (if needed a temp file in /tmp is OK)
